name: Uphill Off road Prado Car Driving Simulator 2017
name_original: Uphill Off road Prado Car Driving Simulator 2017
description:
Hey off-road lovers are you ready for 2017 adventurous off road journey to breathtaking hills and mountains by driving super 4WD prado car and 4x4 jeeps on twisted mountain roads? Welcome to new offroad driving adventure of 2017 and become a Extreme jeep driver of 2017.

Features for Uphill Offroad Prado Car Drive adventure:

- FreeRoam Mode
- 360 Camera view
- Improve xtreme jeep steering skills with lady driver
- Real Suspension of classic jeeps
- Desert and forest type challenging Large Maps
- Luxury prados and European 4x4 SUVs
